meta.min_funds_requirement: 7,000 EUR (~6.3 Lakh INR / ~7,600 USD) + Tuition for first year

documents.title: Application Summary Sheet
documents.description: Signed summary sheet from the AVATS online application.

documents.title: Letter of Acceptance
documents.description: From an Irish university confirming your course.

documents.title: Fee Payment Receipt
documents.description: Proof that you have paid the tuition fees (usually at least 6,000 EUR).

documents.title: Private Medical Insurance
documents.description: Proof of private medical insurance coverage.

documents.title: Evidence of Finances
documents.description: Bank statements showing access to 7,000 EUR + tuition fees.

steps_flow.title: Apply to University
steps_flow.description: Apply to an Irish university and receive the acceptance letter.

steps_flow.title: Pay Tuition Fees
steps_flow.description: Pay the required tuition fee (usually min. 6,000 EUR) to the college.

steps_flow.title: Submit Documents
steps_flow.description: Submit passport and all original documents at VFS Global.

application_platforms.name: University Portals
application_platforms.description: Applications are submitted directly to each university's online portal.

required_exams: IELTS / TOEFL / PTE (Mandatory for English proficiency)

pre_visa_steps.title: Choose Course
pre_visa_steps.description: Select a course from the ILEP (Interim List of Eligible Programmes).

pre_visa_steps.title: Pay Fees
pre_visa_steps.description: Pay the tuition fee to secure your place and for visa purposes.
